channel.title: CVE Feed for Jiransecurity -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Jiransecurity -- all products

item.title: CVE-2020-7845|2024-08-04T09:41:01.866Z -- jiransecurity -- spamsniper
item.description: Spamsniper 5.0 ~ 5.2.7 contain a stack-based buffer overflow vulnerability caused by improper boundary checks when parsing MAIL FROM command. It leads remote attacker to execute arbitrary code via crafted packet.
